sentences.en: I love my skin, it is smooth willowy.
sentences.cn: 我爱我的皮肤, 它光滑有弹性.

sentences.en: Often eats ferri archery target food skin gloss ruddy willowy, needs the sufficient blood supplies.
sentences.cn: 常吃含铁质的食物皮肤光泽红润有弹性, 需要充足的血液供给.

sentences.en: Rhoda's willowy figure, modish straw hat, and fuchsia gloves and shoes surprised Janice.
sentences.cn: 罗达的苗条身材, 时髦的草帽, 紫红色的手套和鞋使杰妮丝有些惊讶.

sentences.en: She is really thin, a willowy 5 feet and 7 inches tall.
sentences.cn: 她很瘦, 像柳条又瘦又高.

sentences.en: She was pale and willowy, with violet eyes.
sentences.cn: 她肤色白皙，身材修长，有一双紫罗蓝色的眼睛。

sentences.en: Willowy and long - limbed , Liukin dances across the beam and around the uneven bars.
sentences.cn: 苗条和修长的肢体,柳金在平衡木和高低杠上舞蹈着.

trans.tran_cn: （女人）苗条的，高而纤细的，袅娜
